messages.message:
Hey team! I'm looking into replacing `@instabase.com/toast` in the enterprise platform with the toast from `@instabase/pollen` , mainly because we use some util functions and components that'd trigger toasts in both aihub and non aihub envs.
The toast in pollen doesn't have ~`useStatusToast` an~d `callPromiseWithToast` . Rather than copying these 2 util functions to the main repo, I'm thinking that we can keep using ~`useStatusToast` and~ `callPromiseWithToast` from `@instabase.com/toast` . This means that it's possible that a page in non aihub envs will show different toast styles. Are we okay with this approach? Any other suggestions?
Yeah it'd be great to consolidate! I think we should go all the way if we want to stop using @instabase.com/toast. What is stopping you from wanting to copy the utils to somewhere within Lib?
+1, we could create a version of `useStatusToast` / `callPromiseWithToast` that uses the Pollen toast instead?
Mostly time & effort on converting the existing version to use the new pollen toast interface :sweat_smile: .
Also, i thought that we are going to retire the enterprise platform (:thinking_rotating:) but I guess it will stay for a while
ah, we donâ€™t have to make all the changes at once for sure
Cool! I'll look into how converting them. Thanks for the input :smile:
